Node.definition: = a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= town; ◄ territory of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► location of Tent of Meeting for some time

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

literally: Tent of Meeting; hence: = construction, also referred to as the Tabernacle (מִשְׁכָּן) or the Tent of the Testimony, ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► as the sanctuary where YHWH chose to meet with his people, before Solomon's temple was built

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
literally: to be trodden underfoot; hence: = state in which land has come under someone's authority or control, usually after having been conquered with force
= state in which humans, animals, plants, or objects remain in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process by which humans receive a portion of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= man, also known as Hoshea (הֹושֵׁעַ) and Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ) ◄ son of Nun (נוּן) tribe of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► one of the twelve men sent by Moses (מֹשֶׁה) to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to Joshua (יְהֹושֻׁעַ) Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) into Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= referent to an unknown point in time; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out which point in time is intended; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that this point of time may never arrive
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse
= action by which humans take ownership of land and other possessions

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor
literally: to give; hence: = action by which humans or deities make a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move through an area without a specific destination

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker indicating that two propositions are proportional to one another in quantity, frequency, intensity, or content
= action by which humans divide an object (or range of objects) into portions and share them out among each other

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= man; ◄ eleventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► father of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) and Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) each founder of a tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
= referent to a group of male (and female) participants that are addressed if a discourse
= action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions
literally: to cast the lot; hence: = causative action by which humans throw lots (גֹּורָל) in order to determine the will of a deity regarding a certain issue
= the process of arriving at a decision based on casting the lot
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions
= member of the Levite clan, responsible for temple duties
= a role in which humans, through a process of ordination (מלא) and consecration (קדשׁ) are responsible for performing religious services on behalf of others
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ first son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= one part of an object or substance that has been divided into two parts
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
literally: the rising (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= man, also known as Hoshea (הֹושֵׁעַ) and Jeshua (יֵשׁוּעַ) ◄ son of Nun (נוּן) tribe of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) ► one of the twelve men sent by Moses (מֹשֶׁה) to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to Joshua (יְהֹושֻׁעַ) Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) into Canaan (כְּנַעַן)

literally: valley of the son of Hinnom; = valley, ◄ located west and south of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) ► infamous for the idol worship that took place there|literally: valley of (the son(s) of) Hinnom (גֵּי בְנֵי־הִנֹּם) = valley, ◄ located west and south of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) ► infamous for the idol worship that took place there

Node.definition: literally: shoulder; hence: = side of a mountain or hill
= inhabitant of Jebus (יְבוּס) ◄ original inhabitants of Canaan (כְּנַעַן)
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
literally: (a boundary or measuring line) goes down; hence: = state in which a boundary or measuring line follows a certain trajectory downhill
= spring; ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= process by which an imaginary line makes a turn in another direction
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: Stone of Bohan the Son of Reuben|stone (of) Bohan son of Reuben
Node.definition: see אֶבֶן בֹּהַן בֶּנ׃־רְאוּבֵן (אֶבֶן בֹּהַן בֶּן־רְאוּבֵן)|= stone or rock ◄ located on boundary between territories of Judah (יְהוּדָה) and Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ≈ associated with Bohan, one of the sons of Reuben (רְאוּבֵן)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ first son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: shoulder; hence: = side of a mountain or hill
= relational linking an event to a location right in front of another location
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
literally: (a boundary or measuring line) goes down; hence: = state in which a boundary or measuring line follows a certain trajectory downhill

literally: shoulder; hence: = side of a mountain or hill

= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
literally: outlet; hence: = location to which a boundary extends before taking a significant turn in a different direction
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= a broad inlet of the sea where the land curves inward

literally: the sea of salt; hence: = a large body of salt water located in the basin of the Jordan Valley, east of Judah; the Jordan River flows from the north into the northern part of this sea; the water is so salty that no living organism inhabits them

= literally: Sea of Salt; one of the names of the Dead Sea, because of the high concentration of salt in its water|= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the left of a person when facing the direction of the rising sun‎, ◄ named after Mount Zaphon which is located in northern Syria
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= a cardinal direction indicating the direction to the right of a person facing the direction of the rising sun, ◄ which is the direction of the Negev desert
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= state in which a particular geographical object forms the boundary of a certain area

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= one of the sides or corners of an object
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a set of limits that separates part of a whole from other parts, with focus either on the limits itself or on the area or object surrounded by it
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= collection of dwellings, not surrounded by a wall

= town, possibly to be identified with Geba (גֶּבַע) ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► place where someone's concubine (פִּילֶגֶשׁ) was raped by a large group of men; home town of King Saul (שָׁאוּל)
